html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00532025-01-31IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Cancellation of Immigration Documents)
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING THE IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (CANCELLATION OF IMMIGRATION DOCUMENTS) in order to (1) allow an officer to cancel an Electronic Travel Authorizations (eTA), a Temporary Resident Visa or a study or work permit on a case by case basis in situations of inadmissability or ineligiblity, and when documents are issued based on an administrative error; (2) to make a foreign national ineligible to hold an an eTA if the holder was refused or refused renewal of a study or work permit; and (3) to automatically cancel an eTA or a TRV in situations where the individual has changed status or is no longer in possession of the document (error, death, or the holder has become a permanent resident).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0011 Publication Date: 2025-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING THE IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (CANCELLATION OF IMMIGRATION DOCUMENTS) in order to (1) allow an officer to cancel an Electronic Travel Authorizations (eTA), a Temporary Resident Visa or a study or work permit on a case by case basis in situations of inadmissability or ineligiblity, and when documents are issued based on an administrative error; (2) to make a foreign national ineligible to hold an an eTA if the holder was refused or refused renewal of a study or work permit; and (3) to automatically cancel an eTA or a TRV in situations where the individual has changed status or is no longer in possession of the document (error, death, or the holder has become a permanent resident).
